about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in an open-world first-person simulation game where you step into the shoes of a master mixologist. Every drink you pour and every decision you make shapes your bar’s atmosphere. Use your trusty truck to drive to stores and buy the items you need to create the perfect setting. Spend your hard-earned cash on quirky decor, or upgrade to a swankier spot as you expand your business. Your regulars will keep coming back for your expert concoctions—unless you make them mad or they end up in the cemetery. Each choice matters as you grow your bar, interact with colorful characters, and do your best to keep your customers alive and happy in a world where everything is on the line.


  • Extensive Drink Creation: Discover and craft thousands of unique drinks, each with its own fictional backstory, adding depth and creativity to your mixology experience.
  • Bar Management: Customize and upgrade your bar by purchasing decorations and furniture. Expand your business by acquiring new venues to create the ultimate bar empire.
  • Persistent Characters: Build relationships with customers whose stories evolve over time. But be careful—mistakes can lead to permanent consequences, including character deaths.
  • Safety Management: Keep an eye on your finances and ensure overly intoxicated patrons get home safely to avoid tragic accidents and maintain your bar’s reputation.
  • Dynamic Environment: Immerse yourself in a world with a realistic day-night cycle and a detailed weather system, enhancing the atmosphere without impacting gameplay.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains mature content related to alcohol consumption and its consequences. Players will take on the role of a bartender, serving drinks to characters who may become intoxicated. As characters leave the bar, there is a possibility that they could be hit by a car, either by the player or by other drivers on the road. The game explores themes of alcohol abuse and the dangers associated with excessive drinking. While the game does not depict sexual acts, non-consensual sex, or self-harm, players sensitive to topics such as alcohol abuse, drunk driving, or violence may wish to proceed with caution.
